greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = c(n) + 2*a(floor(n/2)), where c(n) is the characteristic function of odd composites, A071904.
comment: 1-bits in base-2 expansion of a(n) indicate the positions of odd nonprimes in the sequence [n, floor(n/2), floor(n/4), ..., 1].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: For all n >= 1, a(n) + A292596(n) = n.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 27 2017
